ygData.msgSnippet: ... He ran over to Angel Prime and Prowl. I had my hands full over there, with Unitron. Whats the situation? ... Killfest, you want to pull back to base,

::Hot Rod::

He ran over to Angel Prime and Prowl.
"I had my hands full over there, with Unitron. Whats the situation?"

::DrillBit::

"Killfest, you want to pull back to base, try to keep going, or stay and
fight?"

::Demolition::

He banged on the force fields of the brig.
"I'm going to kill you, Maximals!"

::Dollen::

He stayed by DrillBit, covering him, untill he was done talking.
